By  Michael SwiontekNovember  

The DeKalb City Council meeting Monday night dealt with diverse issues affecting many subgroups within the community including homeowners students and the local work force PERIOD

When the discussion of impact fees became too lengthy and reached the hour mark Van Buer tried to curtail the discussion saying I think we have said enough. editors Note See accompanying article for more information. moving on the council unanimously passed a motion authorizing an engineering agreement with Hanson Professional Services for the East Lincoln Highway Beautification Project PERIOD The project will cost the city  PERIOD An abandoned lot between Second and Third Streets could potentially house a park PERIOD

We could see some striking changes to the east side of town said fourth Ward council member Donna Gorski PERIOD

Next a development agreement was established with developer BGR DeKalb that offers tax abatements and financial assistance for the Peace Road Corporate Center PERIOD The center would house a distribution center for a currently local company PERIOD

The previously secret Project Oak was revealed as DeKalbs own office supply company 3M PERIOD The new facility would create  new jobs with an average annual salary of  PERIOD Construction will begin immediately with an aggressive schedule to meet its targeted Jan PERIOD  opening date PERIOD

This will cement 3M in the community said Roger Hopkins executive director of DeKalb County Economic Development Corporation PERIOD

In reference to transportation growth a resolution was passed to improve the DeKalb Municipal Airport PERIOD

DeKalb is getting closer to being able to accommodate corporate jets landing at the airport which could attract a number of companies to the area said sixth Ward Alderman Dave Baker PERIOD

Discussion then turned to the lack of awareness of the citys firsttime home buyer aid program which has led to its diminished use PERIOD Fewer people are taking advantage of the program despite more advertising said Assistant City Manager Linda Wiggins PERIOD

Baker proposed the DeKalb Channel  advertisement to refer potential applicants to the city of DeKalb Web site for more information to help with promoting the program PERIOD

A special workshop meeting is scheduled for  p.m PERIOD on Dec PERIOD  PERIOD The council will discuss the proposed and hotlydebated DeKalb Business Center south of Interstate88 PERIOD
